name: Real - Facial Composite - Creator
description:
Are you saw lot of thriller? Are you like the CSI series? You want to try, how are working the real facial composite creator.
Now you can try! You can use lot of realistic face items,noses, eyes, ears and more, and you can modify with scale and rotate for a realistic face. The finished picture you can send it in e-mail or share on facebook for your friends.
Have a fun!
